# Roleplay Rule 16 - Use appropriate names for characters [color=SlateGray][italic]Revision A, 2025-10-11[/italic][/color]
Unless otherwise specified, roundstart names must not: - Be famous figures - Be low-effort - Be miscapitalized - Be mispunctuated - Be unpronouncable - Break convention (unless following a theme) - Break other rules - Contain emojis - Contain numbers - Contain titles - Contain unrecognizable or untypeable symbols - Exploit in-game naming mechanics
Silicons are exempt from roundstart name rules. Clown, Mime, and Musician stage names may contain non-familial titles and be mildly low-effort.
## Conventions and Examples Humans follow a "'First name' 'Middle name (optional)' 'Surname'" convention, which may be appended with familial titles and Roman numerals: [color=#449944]Appropriate:[/color] - Tom Fisher - Tom J. Fisher - Tom Jay Fisher - TJ Fisher - Spacey Chapman - Spacey Chapman Jr. III
[color=#994444]Prohibited:[/color] - Jane (breaks convention) - Bob (breaks convention) - bob bifel (is miscapitalized) - Dr. Tom Fisher 3 (contains non-familial title and number) - Dr. Tom Fisher (contains non-familial title and number) - TJ F (breaks convention) - Tom the CXIV (is low-effort and breaks convention) - Walter White (is famous figure) - George Washington (is famous figure) - Joe Biden (is famous figure) - Ben Dover (is low-effort and breaks other rules) - MIKE HUNT (is low-effort, is miscapitalized, and breaks other rules)
Dwarves follow human names of Nordic origin. [color=#449944]Appropriate:[/color] - Ingrid Firebreath - Björn Lightningclaw - Åse Forgebreaker
Reptilians follow Argonian names of Jel origin (The Elder Scrolls series) or a "'Verb'-'article'-'Noun'" convention: [color=#449944]Appropriate:[/color] - Vistha-Druja - Ber-Mei - Cleans-the-Airlocks - Stuns-the-Prisoner
[color=#994444]Prohibited:[/color] - Runs-from Trouble (is mispunctuated, breaks convention) - Bans-the-Admins (is low-effort)
Slime People follow human names with optional surname and onomatopoeia theme: [color=#449944]Appropriate:[/color] - Foolp Suub - Foolp - Rain Caldwell
[color=#994444]Prohibited:[/color] - Slime (is low-effort) - Teal Slime (is low-effort)
Diona follow a "'Noun' of 'Noun'" convention with a nature theme: [color=#449944]Appropriate:[/color] - Petal of Tranquility - Garden of Relaxation
[color=#994444]Prohibited:[/color] - Tree but Alive (is low-effort and breaks convention)
Moth People follow human names of Latin origin or with a light theme: [color=#449944]Appropriate:[/color] - Socrates Temnora - Sierra Lightseeker - James Nightflitter
Arachnids follow human names of Latin origin: [color=#449944]Appropriate:[/color] - Argyroneta Reticulatus - Loxosceles Domesticus - Spider-Man (is famous figure, is low-effort, breaks convention)
Vox follow names made up of repeating syllables: [color=#449944]Appropriate:[/color] - Hirixashahre - Xapikrikrik
[color=#994444]Prohibited:[/color] - Chipikirchitchitchitbecretretrer (is unpronouncable) - Trololol (is low-effort) - Skibidi (is low-effort)
Vulpkanin follow human names of Slavic origin: [color=#449944]Appropriate:[/color] - Małgorzata Nowak - Svetlana Olegovna
[color=#994444]Prohibited:[/color] - Furry (is low-effort and breaks convention) - Дpyr (is low-effort, breaks convention, and contains unrecognizable or untypeable symbols) - Vladmir Lenin (is famous figure) - Grzegorz Brzęczyszczykiewicz (is famous figure and unpronouncable)
Other examples of inappropriate names: [color=#994444]Prohibited:[/color] - XxRobustxX (is low-effort and unpronounceable) - SDpksSodjdfk (is low-effort and unpronounceable) - Lkdsoisgoieun (is low-effort and unpronounceable) - :3 (is low-effort and unpronounceable) - john spacestation (is low-effort and miscapitalized) - Greytide (is low-effort) - Passenger (is low-effort) - Admin (is low-effort) - Game-Master (is low-effort) - Joe Mamma (is low-effort) - Joe McRogan (is famous figure and low-effort) - The Drunk (is low-effort) - Mark Not a Lizardman Zuckerber (is famous figure and low-effort) - Urist McHands (exploits in-game default humanoid naming mechanic) - Middle-Aged Man (exploits in-game obscured identity naming mechanics) - Operative Whiskey (exploits in-game antagonist naming mechanics)
